mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.fk_report_id , t1.original , t1.court , t1.docket_no , t1.docket_cause , t1.filing_way , t1.filing_time , t1.docket_status , t1.apply_enforce_subject , t1.executed_enforce_subject , t1.apply_enforce_amount , t1.executed_enforce_amount , t1.closed_time , t1.isfail , t1.create_time , t1.modify_time , t1.validate_state , t1.create_by , t1.update_by from ext_wl_sh_sr_enforcements t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update ext_wl_sh_sr_enforcements t1 set t1.fk_report_id =#{dto.fkReportId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.original =#{dto.original,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.court =#{dto.court,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.docket_no =#{dto.docketNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.docket_cause =#{dto.docketCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.filing_way =#{dto.filingWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.filing_time =#{dto.filingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.docket_status =#{dto.docketStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.apply_enforce_subject =#{dto.applyEnforceSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.executed_enforce_subject =#{dto.executedEnforceSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.apply_enforce_amount =#{dto.applyEnforceAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.executed_enforce_amount =#{dto.executedEnforceAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.closed_time =#{dto.closedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.isfail =#{dto.isfail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.create_time =#{dto.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t1.modify_time =#{dto.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t1.validate_state ='1', t1.create_by =#{dto.createBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.update_by =#{dto.updateBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete from ext_wl_sh_sr_enforcements t1 where t1.ID in (${ids} )
mapper.update: update ext_wl_sh_sr_enforcements t1 set t1.validate_state='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
